description:
holo8 is an Exit8-like game based around the Hololive idol group released under the HoloIndie project by frog blend. 
Set in Hololive's temporary office, you are tasked with reaching the first floor of an endlessly looping office building while detecting and avoiding anomalies.

alpha_v0.1.0.description: Initial release. There's still more to do, but this is to a state where I'm OK releasing it.
alpha_v0.1.0.title: ArchipelagoHolo8 Alpha v0.1.0

alpha_v0.1.1.description:
**NOTABLE:** Changed the elevator trackerboard: it will now display how many checks are currently in logic.

**GENERAL:** Removed vestigial code.
**GENERAL:** Fixed spelling errors of Miteiru's name.
**APWORLD:** Fixed a logic error that would cause `Luna and the Ducks` to error if assigned to a progression item.
**APWORLD:** Changed the name of a few anomalies. This should not affect location IDs.
alpha_v0.1.1.title: ArchipelagoHolo8 Alpha v0.1.1

v0.2.0-alpha.description:
**NOTABLE:** Added Talentsanity! You can now choose if you would like to have each individual talent in the item pool.

**GENERAL:** Heavy changes to the item and APworld backend have been done in order to account for Talentsanity. Please report issues in the Archipelago Discord thread!
**APWORLD:** Changed the final item to `Shredded Ofuda Tags`.
**CLIENT:** Hopefully fixed some issues with the anomaly counter not rendering due to anomaly desyncs.
v0.2.0-alpha.title: ArchipelagoHolo8 Alpha v0.2.0

v0.2.1-alpha.description:
**NOTABLE:** Added a new option: *DeathLink On Wrong Elevator.* This will send a DeatLlink if you board the wrong elevator.
**NOTABLE:** Added three new checks for interacting with "interactable" anomalies! These checks are:
- `Enjoy A Bowl of Char Siu Ramen`
- `Toasting Toaster-Kun's Toast`
- `Situational Voice at the Ice Cream Bar`

**GENERAL:** Several anomalies involving other talents interacting with the default Ayame, Suisei and Marine characters have had their logic changed.
- `Mio and Ayame` and `Lui and the Sleepy Ayame` now require *Nakiri Ayame / Hololive Generation 2*.
- `miComet`, `StartEnd`, and `Suisei and Calliope's Ramen` now require *Hoshimachi Suisei / Hololive Generation 0*.
- `Koronesuki Poster` now requires *Houshou Marine / Hololive Fantasy*.

**GENERAL:** `Marine's Watchful Eye` is no longer marked as a Hard anomaly.
**APWORLD:** Talent Mode is now the default option for YAMLs.
**CLIENT:** The Anomaly Mode ending is now always played whenever Anomaly Mode is a part of the seed.
**CLIENT:** Fixed a bug where entering elevators when not connected to Archipelago caused the game to hang.
**CLIENT:** Fixed a bug that would send DeathLinks after being killed while viewing an anomaly in the Anomaly List.
v0.2.1-alpha.title: ArchipelagoHolo8 Alpha v0.2.1

v0.2.2-alpha.description:
**APWORLD:** Fixed a logic error with `StartEnd`. *Hoshimachi Suisei* is now required.
**CLIENT:** Fixed a bug that would cause the game to hang when Hard Anomalies were turned on.
**CLIENT:** Updated Archipelago.MultiClient.Net to 6.6.1.
**CLIENT:** Updated internal AP version to 0.6.2.
v0.2.2-alpha.title: ArchipelagoHolo8 Alpha v0.2.2

v0.2.3-alpha.description:
**APWORLD:** Made the Mikodanye and Taranchama items progression_skip_balancing to prevent early-release seeds.
**APWORLD:** Fixed a datapackage error that made `Miteiru Poster's Eyes` and `Marine's Eyepatch Design` uncheckable.
**APWORLD:** Added an archipelago.json manifest file to enable compatibility with the Multiworld Index, other AP forks, and future releases of Archipelago.
**CLIENT:** Added a blurb on the title screen stating the mod version.
**CLIENT:** Updated Archipelago.MultiClient.Net to 6.7.0.
**CLIENT:** Updated internal AP version to 0.6.3.
v0.2.3-alpha.title: ArchipelagoHolo8 Alpha v0.2.3

v0.3.0-alpha.description:
*"This update is trash!"*

**NOTABLE:** Added two new filler items: `Chill Video` and `Memory Video`. These items will unlock special videos in the EX menu.
**NOTABLE:** Added a new option for Talentsanity players: `talentsanity_filler`. This option will fill empty slots in the item pool with Hololive Production talents not in holo8.
**CLIENT:** The elevator floor indicator will now display an infinity symbol if goal is not possible yet.
**APWORLD:** `enable_interactive_anomalies` is now bundled with slot data. Sorry about that one Shiny.
**APWORLD:** Fixed a spelling error on the `Matsuri, Matsurisu, and Ebifrion` location.
**APWORLD:** Fixed a few errors with archipelago.json.
v0.3.0-alpha.title: ArchipelagoHolo8 Alpha v0.3.0
